summary: Shows markers for pages of Jiub\'s Opus
descriptionHtml:
*UPDATE 1.2* The mod now has scripts! yay! this means that it should all work perfectly and once you have all the pages it will point you back to jiub like it should. Any issues please let me know

A quick little mod to display the location of the pages of Jiub\'s Opus for the quest \'Impatience of a Saint\' because they\'re super annoying to find.
The markers become active once you have found Jiub and started the quest

Requires Dawnguard
author: Nightterror
